detail_desc: Aviator-style,tinted sunglasses with metal and plastic frames and UV-protective, tinted lenses.
Thin metal-chain bracelets with a pendant in various designs.
Calf-length dress in a viscose weave with a collar, concealed buttons down the front, long sleeves with wide, buttoned cuffs and a detachable belt with metal D-rings. Unlined.
Short satin top with a decorative knot detail at the front, jersey inset at the back, sparkly stones front and back and a silicone trim at the top. Lined.
Double-knit jumper with a wide, lace-trimmed, ribbed V-neck. Dropped shoulders, wide sleeves with close-fitting, ribbed cuffs, and a ribbed hem.
Straight-cut dress in a soft viscose weave with a V-neck and small stand-up collar. Dropped shoulders, short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Unlined.
Cardigan in fine-knit cotton with moss-knit stripes, buttons down the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Lined triangular scarves in soft cotton jersey with an adjustable press-stud fastening at the back of the neck.
5-pocket jeans in washed, stretch denim made from an extra soft, shape-retaining Tencel™ lyocell blend. Regular waist, zip fly and button, and skinny legs.

Short-sleeved blouse in a viscose crêpe weave with a round neckline and small opening with a concealed button at the back of the neck. Decorative gathers at the shoulders and along the yoke at the back.
Small bucket bag in grained imitation leather with a drawstring closure, magnetic fastener at the top and a narrow shoulder strap. Size 12x16x19.5 cm.
Lightly padded satin bomber jacket with quilted sleeves, a small, ribbed stand-up collar and zip down the front. Jetted front pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Lined.
Mittens in a soft knit with fold-down ribbing at the cuffs. Fleece lining. Sizes 0-6M without thumbs.
5-pocket shorts in washed stretch denim with hard-worn details, a regular waist, zip fly and straight legs with sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Ankle-length cigarette trousers in a stretch weave with a regular waist, concealed zip in one side, fake back pockets and tapered legs with slits at the hems.
Vest top in soft slub cotton jersey with a racer back.

Dress in a softly draping viscose weave with decorative frills. Stand-up collar, concealed buttons at the top and long balloon sleeves with a puff at the shoulders and wide, close-fitting cuffs with covered buttons. Seam at the waist and a gentle flare to the hem. Unlined.
Top in soft cotton jersey with a boat neck and deep opening at the back with ties. Gathered seam under the bust to create soft draping.
Double-breasted trenchcoat in woven fabric with a collar and detachable shoulder tabs. Pockets in the sides, a detachable belt at the waist and a single back vent. Lined.
Short shorts in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated, drawstring jersey waistband, side pockets and rounded hems.
Off-the-shoulder blouse in a patterned crêpe weave with smocking and a small frill trim at the top and 3/4-length trumpet sleeves. Seam and a wide flounce at the hem.
Thin tights with an elasticated waist.

Short dress in a patterned viscose weave with an opening and concealed button at the back of the neck and 3/4-length balloon sleeves with narrow cuffs. Double layer at the front with a practical inner top for easier nursing access and an elasticated seam at the waist. Unlined.
Pyjama shorts in a cotton weave with an elasticated drawstring waist and fake fly.
Short dress in cotton jersey with ribbing around the neckline and short cap sleeves. Unlined.
Jumper in a soft, fine-knit viscose blend with frills on the sleeves.
Gloves in a soft, fine knit with a glow-in-the-dark print on the uppers and ribbed cuffs.
Shorts in lightweight cotton sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated, drawstring waist, side pockets, a print motif and appliqués at the back, and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Short skirt in woven fabric with a sewn-in wrapover at the front, concealed zip at the back and asymmetric hem. Unlined.
Straight-cut top in a cotton weave with broderie anglaise. Square neckline and long raglan sleeves.
Set with a hat and mittens in a textured knit containing glittery threads. Hat with a decorative pompom at the top and a ribbed hems. Mittens with ribbed cuffs. Cotton jersey lining.
Long-sleeved lace dress with a V-neck and wrapover front. Concealed zip in the side, seam at the waist and skirt with box pleats. Partly lined.
Shirt in a patterned viscose weave with a turn-down collar, classic front, yoke at the back and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.
Long-sleeved bodysuits in soft, organic cotton jersey with a wrapover front and press-studs at the side and crotch.
Fitted jacket in woven fabric with notch lapels, jetted front pockets, a decorative button at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined.
Tops in soft jersey with a racer back and an elasticated hem. The tops are designed with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility.
Soft, non-wired bra in lace with wide shoulder straps, lined cups with removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support, and a wide lace trim at the hem. No fasteners.
Set with fleece-lined mittens and a fleece-lined hat in a soft, jacquard-knit cotton blend. Mittens with foldover, ribbed cuffs. Hat with a pompom on the top, earflaps and ties under the chin.
Top in light, printed sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Sturdy microfibre briefs that hold in and shape the waist with a lined gusset and wide lace trims at the sides.
Pyjamas in soft, cotton jersey. Long-sleeved top with ribbing around the neckline and cuffs. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.

Push-up bra top in lace with underwired, moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Short lace sleeves that continue back over the shoulders, narrow adjustable shoulder straps, decorative ties at the front and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Shirt in a cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke at the back. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a tie detail at the front of the hem.

Top in sweatshirt fabric with block-coloured panels at the front in a relaxed fit. Ribbed stand-up collar with a zip at the top, long sleeves and ribbing around the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Long-sleeved top in soft, printed cotton jersey with ribbing around the neckline and cuffs.

Single-breasted jacket in woven fabric. The jacket is unconstructed, which gives it a more relaxed, less formal look and has narrow notch lapels, a decorative buttonhole and a one-button fastening at the front. Decorative chest pocket, patch front pockets, one inner pocket with a button, and a single back vent. Lined. Skinny Fit – a slightly shorter style that shapes in at the chest and tapers sharply at the waist. This combined with narrow shoulders and sleeves creates a completely fitted silhouette.
Fully lined, waist-high bikini bottoms in fast-drying functional fabric with medium coverage at the back.
Metal rings in various sizes and designs that can be worn on both the upper and lower part of the finger.

Platform sandals in imitation suede with imitation cork wedge heels, an adjustable ankle strap with a metal buckle and open toes. Imitation leather insoles and rubber soles. Platform 2.5 cm, heel approx. 10cm.
Scarf in a soft wool weave with fringes on the short sides. Size 45x190 cm.
Patterned swim shorts with elastication and ties at the waist and a fly with a hook and loop fastening. Soft mesh inner shorts.

Blouse in an airy weave. Small stand-up collar with pleats at the front to create soft draping, an opening and button at the back of the neck and a rounded hem. Long sleeves with wide, buttoned cuffs and pleats to create gentle volume. Lined.
Short polo-neck jumper in soft, fine-knit fluffy yarn with short sleeves and narrow ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Short, gently fitted skirt in a textured bouclé weave. High waist with decorative metal buttons at the front, a concealed zip at the back and diagonal side pockets. Recycled polyester lining.

Ankle-length joggers in woven fabric with an elasticated, drawstring waist, diagonal side pockets and welt back pockets. Legs with creases and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems. Slim Fit – a fit that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a fitted silhouette.
Long-sleeved top in cotton jersey with a reversible sequin motif on the front (sizes 1½-4Y with normal sequins). Slightly longer at the back with a gently rounded hem.
Cargo trousers in a stretch cotton weave with a regular waist, zip fly and button and slim legs, Diagonal side pockets, welt back pockets with a flap, and leg pockets with a pleat and flap.
Short jacket in sequin-embroidered mesh with a single hook-and-eye fastening at the neck and 3/4-length sleeves with fringes made of plastic beads. Satin lining.
Short, fitted dress in woven fabric with narrow shoulder straps, a zip at the back and a seam at the waist.
Vest tops in soft cotton jersey with a ribbed trim around the neckline and armholes.
Short, long-sleeved dress in woven fabric with an opening and button at the back of the neck, a seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt.

Ankle-length suit trousers in a stretch weave with a zip fly, hook-and-eye fastener and concealed button. Side pockets and welt back pockets with a button. Skinny Fit – a fit with slightly shorter legs that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a completely fitted silhouette.
Cardigan knitted in soft, garter-stitched cotton with buttons down the front and long sleeves.
Top in soft organic cotton jersey with short puff sleeves and a rounded collar with an embroidered, scalloped trim. Press-studs at the back of the neck.
Fully lined bikini bottoms with a mid waist, frill trim at the top and cutaway coverage at the back.
Short-sleeved polo shirts in cotton piqué with a ribbed collar (one patterned), a button placket and short slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.
Chelsea boots with elastic gores in the sides and chunky soles. Linings in satin made from recycled polyester and insoles in imitation leather. Heel 5.5 cm.
Lightweight puffer jacket in nylon with a filling of 70% down and 30% feathers. Stand-up collar, zip down the front with a chin guard, zipped side pockets and covered elastication at the cuffs.
Straight-cut shirt in a soft viscose weave with a collar, buttons down the front, long sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Sandals in imitation leather with square toes and narrow straps that cross over the foot and go around the ankle. Adjustable fastening with a small metal buckle. Finely fluted soles.
Partly lined, patterned bikini. Top with a flounce at the top that continues over one shoulder, and a narrow strap over the other shoulder. Lined at the front. Matching, fully lined bikini bottoms.

Set with a long-sleeved bodysuit and pair of leggings in soft cotton jersey. Bodysuit with press-studs at the back and crotch. Ribbed leggings with an elasticated waist and decorative bow at the back.
Leather slides with wide, crossover straps and square toes. Leather linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Shirt in soft, checked cotton flannel with a turn-down collar, classic front, two open chest pockets and a yoke at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Sunglasses with metal and plastic frames and tinted, UV-protective lenses.
Boots in imitation leather with a zip in one side, lacing at the front, toe caps and a loop at the back. Cotton canvas linings and insoles and chunky soles. Heel 3 cm.
Short, straight-cut sleeveless dress in a denim-look weave made from a cotton blend with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps and a V-neck front and back.
Fitted, long-sleeved, polo-neck top in soft jersey.
Leggings in soft cotton jersey with concealed elastication at the waist.
Top in a soft, fine knit. Deep, lace-trimmed neckline at the back with a wrapover, dropped shoulders and long, close-fitting sleeves.
